text: phir unake peechhe kuchh aise logon ne unakee jagah lee, jo pustak ke uttaraadhikaaree hokar bhee tuchchh sansaar ka laabh sametane lage aur kahane lage ki hamen kshama kar diya jaayega aur yadi usee ke samaan unhen laabh haath aa jaaye, to use bhee le lenge. kya unase pustak ka drdh vachan nahin liya gaya hai ki allaah par sach hee bolenge, jabaki pustak mein jo kuchh hai, usaka adhyayan kar chuke hain? aur paralok ka ghar (svarg) uttam hai, unake lie jo allaah se darate hon. to kya ve itana bhee nahin[1] samajhate
